QuestData.Title: Grimwing the Devourer
QuestData.Description: You have my thanks for rescuing me from captivity, $n.$b$bHowever, Azoran is no mere demon. He is a powerful eredar who commands great rank within the Burning Legion.$b$bBefore we can get to him, there is another that must be destroyed.$b$bGrimwing the Devourer is the strongest of the felbats. Place the basilisk flesh upon the altar to the north and slay Grimwing when she appears.$b$bThen, return to me with her head. My thirst for vengeance must be quenched.
